signInPage.title: Sign In • Inctagram
signInPage.meta_description: Welcome back to Inctagram. Sign in to check out what your friends, family & interests have been capturing & sharing around the world
signInPage.question: Don’t have an account?

signUpPage.title: Sign Up • Inctagram
signUpPage.meta_description: Join Inctagram! Sign up to see photos, videos, stories & messages from your friends, family & interests around the world
signUpPage.question: Do you have an account?

forgotPasswordPage.title: Reset Password • Inctagram
forgotPasswordPage.meta_description: Trouble logging in? Enter your email and we'll send you a link to get back into your account
forgotPasswordPage.enterYourEmailText: Enter your email address and we will send you further instructions
forgotPasswordPage.linkHasBeenSentText: The link has been sent by email. If you don’t receive an email send link again

verificationPage.verificationText: Looks like the verification link has expired. Not to worry, we can send the link again

form.passwordRule: Your password must be between 6 and 20 characters

error.uNameRegisteredError: User with this username is already registered
error.incorrectValue: The password or email you entered is incorrect. Please try again
error.userNameMin: Username must be at least 6 characters
error.userNameMax: Username can not be longer than 30 characters
error.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
error.passwordMax: Password can not be longer than 20 characters
